# Professional Summary
Description: Passionate full-stack developer who learns and transforms complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive solutions through development and design. Specializes in modern web technologies, automated content workflows, and scalable application architecture.

# Technical Skills
Frontend: React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, TypeScript, Redux
Backend: Node.js, FastAPI, Python
Databases: MongoDB, Prisma, Firebase
Cloud & DevOps: Docker, GCP, Firebase, CI/CD pipelines
Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, C++
Tools: Git, Browser optimization, Embedding systems

# Professional Experience
Current Role: Software Engineer at Rava AI (January 2024 - December 2024)
- Developed automated content workflows and embedding systems for diverse content types
- Implemented browser caching optimizations reducing server load by 40%
- Established CI/CD pipelines improving deployment speed by 70%
- Built personalized content generation features serving 1000+ customers based on user personas

Previous Role: Full Stack Developer at SkillRazr (October 2023 - December 2023)
- Engineered interactive Git and SQL learning platforms utilizing GCP and Firebase
- Implemented responsive design principles to optimize cross-device functionality
- Led UI/UX improvements across the platform ecosystem
